channel.title: CVE Feed for Tribulant -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tribulant -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37227|2024-06-21T13:40:52.608Z -- tribulant -- newsletters
item.description: Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Tribulant Newsletters.This issue affects Newsletters: from n/a through 4.9.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-32954|2024-06-04T17:50:03.870Z -- tribulant -- newsletters
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in Tribulant Newsletters.This issue affects Newsletters: from n/a through 4.9.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-31353|2024-04-10T15:30:53.721Z -- tribulant -- slideshow%20gallery
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in Tribulant Slideshow Gallery.This issue affects Slideshow Gallery: from n/a through 1.7.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-31354|2024-04-12T12:24:45.788Z -- tribulant -- slideshow%20gallery
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Tribulant Slideshow Gallery.This issue affects Slideshow Gallery: from n/a through 1.7.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-31355|2024-06-04T17:36:00.587Z -- tribulant -- slideshow%20gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Tribulant Slideshow Gallery.This issue affects Slideshow Gallery: from n/a through 1.7.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-35718|2024-06-10T15:13:52.956Z -- tribulant -- newsletters
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Tribulant Newsletters allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Newsletters: from n/a through 4.9.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-31354|2024-06-12T13:19:22.421Z -- tribulant -- slideshow%20gallery
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Tribulant Slideshow Gallery.This issue affects Slideshow Gallery: from n/a through 1.7.8.
